system.requirements: .Mechanicus Related, Comm. Lore (Mechanicus) +20, Forb. Lore(Archeotech) Apt:Int, Tech
system.descriptionText: Character commands comrade to assist in understanding a device's functions. Character makes +20 Forbidden Lore (Archeotech) Test. If successful they determine the purpose and function of a device, and gain +20 to Tech-Use Tests made involving it until the endo f the encounter. Can be used with Servitor Comrades in addition to normal ones. Note: Mechanicus Related = Any Tech-Priest or Regiment Sworn to the Mechanicus
